sentences.sContent: Varnish the table with two or three coats of water-based varnish.
sentences.sCn: 给桌子涂上2到3层水性清漆。

synos.tran: 亮光漆，清漆；虚饰；光泽面
装饰，粉饰；在…上涂清漆；使…有光泽

remMethod.val: 涂上清漆(varnish)， 这个图案就不容易消失(vanish)了

trans.tranOther: a clear liquid that is painted onto things, especially things made of wood, to protect them, or the hard shiny surface produced by this
